AvoidUncheckedExceptionsInSignatures.description:
Description

Reports unchecked exceptions in thethrowsclause of a method or constructor.
Java doesn’t force the caller to handle an unchecked exception,
so it’s unnecessary except for documentation. A better practice is to document the
exceptional cases with a@throwsJavadoc tag, which allows being more descriptive.
